User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the HydroTrack application.

dailyGoal.description: User's daily hydration goal in ounces.

remindersEnabled.description: Whether the user has enabled hydration reminders.

reminderHours.description: The interval in hours for sending hydration reminders.

todayIntake.description: The total water intake for the current day.

lastLogDate.description: The date of the last water log (YYYY-MM-DD).

WaterLog.title: WaterLog
WaterLog.description: Represents a single instance of water intake logged by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the water log entry.

userId.description: Reference to the User who logged the water intake. (Relationship: User 1:N WaterLog)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the water intake was logged.

amount.description: Amount of water consumed in ounces.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including daily intake. Accessible only by the authenticated user with matching userId.
Stores individual water intake logs for each user for historical data. userId is implicitly denormalized via path.

params.name: waterLogId
params.description: Unique identifier for the water log entry.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to be efficient and secure. Storing the daily intake summary directly on the user profile document minimizes reads when loading the main dashboard. A separate `waterLogs` subcollection is maintained for historical data, which can be used for future charting features without bloating the main user document.
